caseStudiesDetailsDesc.subTitle: Data Science
caseStudiesDetailsDesc.title1: Complete Data Science Training: Mathematics, Statistics, Python, Advanced Statistics in Python
caseStudiesDetailsDesc.paragraph1: Improve Machine Learning algorithms by studying underfitting, overfitting, training, validation, n-fold cross validation, testing, and how hyperparameters could improve performance. Perform linear and logistic regressions in Python.
caseStudiesDetailsDesc.paragraph2: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout.
